name: Earthshakers
detailed_description:
You feel awful pain and wake up at some laboratory. The only thing that comes to mind is that you have to get out of here ...
Use your potential to survive the attacking enemies. Fortunately, the mysterious power you inherently have seems powerful enough to counter strong enemies.

Background

In the not-too-distant future, mankind will be attacked by machine corps that are instructed by High Intelligence AI, called Alphacom. Their surprise attack with more advanced weaponry and technology has led to the collapse of government agencies and the loss of their function ...
Survivors organize resistance and oppose the machine, but with the advent of the Giant Robot 'Curator', which does not allow conventional weapons, the war between mankind and the machine is making a desperate situation for mankind.

Game features

  • Your both hands
    Use the motion controller to fight freely. Your hand can hit, grab, or throw an enemy. Like grabbing weapons and objects.
  • Comfortable movement optimized for VR
    Explore the VR environment with dash and free locomotion. It also supports snap turn and has less burden on VR sickness.
  • A giant robot
    Size is matter. Especially in VR.
  • Non VR mode
    You can enjoy the game without a VR device. Select Desktop (Non VR) mode at startup.

short_description: Earthshakers is an action shooting game that fights against enemies as a post-human "puppeteer" born with the ability to manipulate machines in the future world where the war between humans and machines is deepening.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 (More than equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (More than equivalent)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 (More than equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (More than equivalent)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
